New Records: Sri Lanka recorded their lowest total in T20 cricket with 77 runs
Anrich Nortje took 4/7 in four overs, the best bowling figures in the match
Key Match Events: South Africa restricted Sri Lanka to 77 in 19.1 overs
Anrich Nortje took 4/7 in four overs
Kusal Mendis was the top-scorer for Sri Lanka with 19 off 30 balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York
South Africa defeated Sri Lanka by six wickets in their T20 World Cup opener
